snippet: The company, which is in bankruptcy, said it would focus on selling services to businesses.
abstract: Eastman Kodak, as part of its bankruptcy reorganization, is planning to wind down sales of consumer inkjet printers in 2013, and focus on selling services to businesses.
lead_paragraph: The company, which is in bankruptcy, said it would focus on selling services to businesses.

headline.seo: Kodak to Stop Selling Inkjet Printers
headline.main: Kodak Plans to End Line of Inkjet Printers
headline.print_headline: Kodak Plans To End Line Of Inkjet Printers
